Dependencies:

Curl 7.74.0
https://curl.se/windows/
License: MIT-inspired (https://curl.se/docs/copyright.html)

Curl dependencies:
libcrypto-1_1.dll
https://www.dll-files.com/libcrypto-1_1.dll.html
libssl-1_1.dll
https://www.dll-files.com/libssl-1_1.dll.html

Jansson 2.13.1
https://jansson.readthedocs.io/en/2.13/
License: MIT

GLFW 3.3.2
https://www.glfw.org/
License: BSD-like

FreeType 2.10.4
https://www.freetype.org/
License: BSD-like or GPLv2 by choice (https://www.freetype.org/license.html)

DevIL 1.8.0 
http://openil.sourceforge.net/
License: LGPLv2

New Walt Disney Font
https://www.fontspace.com/new-waltograph-font-f22088


All Windows dependencies are precompiled and installed to dependencies directory

For Ubuntu build, install the following packages:

sudo apt-get install libcurl4-openssl-dev libdevil-dev libjansson-dev libfreetype-dev libglfw3-dev
